TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SynchronizationContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供在各种同步模型中传播同步上下文的基本功能。

span.span: Provides the basic functionality for propagating a synchronization context in various synchronization models.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个基类，可提供无同步的自由线程上下文。The class is a base class that provides a free-threaded context with no synchronization. 此类实现的同步模型的目的是允许公共语言运行时的内部异步/同步操作在不同的同步模型下正常运行。The purpose of the synchronization model implemented by this class is to allow the internal asynchronous/synchronous operations of the common language runtime to behave properly with different synchronization models. 此模型还简化了托管应用程序必须遵循的一些要求，以便在不同的同步环境下正常运行。This model also simplifies some of the requirements that managed applications have had to follow in order to work correctly under different synchronization environments. 同步模型的提供程序可以扩展此类，并为这些方法提供自己的实现。Providers of synchronization models can extend this class and provide their own implementations for these methods. 有关同步上下文的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN 杂志中 [关于 SynchronizationContext 的全部](https://docs.microsoft.com/archive/msdn-magazine/2011/february/msdn-magazine-parallel-computing-it-s-all-about-the-synchronizationcontext) 内容。For more information about synchronization contexts, see the article [It's All About the SynchronizationContext](https://docs.microsoft.com/archive/msdn-magazine/2011/february/msdn-magazine-parallel-computing-it-s-all-about-the-synchronizationcontext) in the MSDN Magazine.

summary.span: 获取当前线程的同步上下文。

span.span: Gets the synchronization context for the current thread.

value.span: 一个 对象，它表示当前同步上下文。

span.span: A object representing the current synchronization context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于将同步上下文从一个线程传播到另一个线程。This property is useful for propagating a synchronization context from one thread to another.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，响应操作已完成的通知。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, responds to the notification that an operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现不包含任何代码。The default implementation contains no code. 您可以选择重写此方法，以提供在操作完成时执行的代码。You can optionally override this method to provide code that executes when an operation is complete.

summary.span: 设置指示需要等待通知的通知，并准备回调方法以使其在发生等待时可以更可靠地被调用。

span.span: Sets notification that wait notification is required and prepares the callback method so it can be called more reliably when a wait occurs.

span.span: An array of type that contains the native operating system handles.

param.span: 若等待所有句柄，则为 ；若等待任一句柄，则为 。

span.span: to wait for all handles; to wait for any handle.

param.span: 等待的毫秒数，或为 (-1)，表示无限期等待。

span.span: The number of milliseconds to wait, or (-1) to wait indefinitely.

summary.span: 等待指定数组中的任一元素或所有元素接收信号。

span.span: Waits for any or all the elements in the specified array to receive a signal.

returns.span: 满足等待的对象的数组索引。

span.span: The array index of the object that satisfied the wait.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用外部声明 来执行等待活动。The method calls the external declaration to perform the wait activity. 重写 方法以更改同步上下文的等待行为。Override the method to change the wait behavior for the synchronization context.

span.span: is null.

summary.span: 用于等待指定数组中的任一元素或所有元素接收信号的 Helper 函数。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是非托管外部 helper 函数的声明。 is a declaration for an unmanaged external helper function. 由 方法调用，以等待指定的操作系统句柄的信号。 is called by the method to wait for a signal for the specified operating system handles.
